item.title: 6.2.1 Device Group
6.2.2 Driver
item.description: Driver # Driver Management for the purpose of monitoring, checking and solving problems arising during vehicle operation. Control documents as well as the driver’s work to be able to handle - solve problems during operation. To view Driver Management do the following: Click on Manage > Configuration > Driver. 1. Create driver # Step 1: Click Create new driver Step 2: The following dialog box appears: Account : The account name you want to add a driver to.

item.title: 6.2.3 Geofences
item.description: Manage Geofences # Manage Geofences to manage zones to check how many times a day the device goes in / out, and how long it is in there. To view Manage Geofences do the following: Click on Manage > Configuration > Geofences. 1. Create new Geofences # Step 1 : Click on Create new Geofences Step 2: The Add Area dialog box appears as shown above: to create polygon shaped area : Touch the screen to select the points that make up the area.

item.title: 6.2.4 Geofence Group
item.description: Manage group geofence # Manage group geofence manage all regions in a given area. To view Manage group geofence do the following: Click on Manage > Configuration > Group geofence. 1. Create group geofence # Step 1: CLick on reate group geofence. Step 2: A dialog box appears: Name : Name the zone group.

item.title: 6.2.5 Landmarks
item.description: Manage landmarks # Manage landmarks to manage the markers on the map to help manage and report whether the device passes through that marker or not. To view Manage landmarks do the following: Click on Manage > Configuration > Landmarks. 1. Create landmarks # Step 1: CLick on Create landmarks. Step 2: Name: Enter the marker name.
